headline: The Bull Case For FactSet Research Systems (FDS) Could Change Following Barclays Multiyear Platform Win Learn Why
summary: On 22 January 2026, Barclays announced a multiyear arrangement with FactSet Research Systems to access a broad suite of FactSet’s data, analytics, and technology solutions for its global client base. This win highlights FactSet’s role as a core market data and analytics provider to a major global bank, reinforcing the relevance of its integrated platform for large institutional clients. Next, we will examine how FactSet’s expanded role in Barclays’ long-term market data strategy shapes the...
